text: On September 23, 2021, a mass shooting happened at a Kroger grocery store in Collierville, Tennessee, United States. One person was killed and 13 others were injured. The shooter, 29-year-old Uk Thang, shot himself and later died. Thang was working at the store as a vendor. It was the second shooting in less than a year at a store owned by Kroger. The first shooting was at a King Soopers store in Boulder, Colorado, in March. ==References== Category:September 2021 events Category:2021 mass shootings in the United States Category:2021 murders in the United States Category:2020s in Tennessee Category:Murder-suicides in the United States
title: Collierville Kroger shooting
